channel.title: Project Arete [Hyperion]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qrhxGJ7.png[/img] Welcome to the Project Arete development thread.[/center]
[i]Base?[/i] Project Arete will be based on [b]Hyperion[/b] by [b]Graham[/b]. The client will be based on [b]SrcAllDummiesRemoved[/b] by [b]MITB[/b].
[i]About[/i] Project Arete will be based in the 2006-07 era of RuneScape. This projects goal is to have the perfect balance between skilling, economy and pvp.
Media: Start of project [img]http://i.imgur.com/E2Tmv48.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gQavwqm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/an8qUys.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/A2Tql0K.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xSRiiLp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yYGaGfY.png[/img]
Update log: [code] *downloaded hyperion & 317 deob *fixed memory leak *initial login area is now edgeville *running with energy added *profanity censor removed *equipment bonuses added *npc loading via xml file added *npc option packets added *character design packet added *crc enabled *private messaging added *ground item system added [/code]
If you wish to join this project, please PM me or message me on skype. justinmintza You do NOT need to know much about Hyperion nor even java. I am always happy to teach what I know :).

item.title: Project Arete [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:7, topic:518235”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=636498.msg4291315#msg4291315 date=1367288284]
A Hyperion project is always interesting. Good luck.
[/quote]why? because we get to watch them go from fairly good bases to absolutely crap?[/quote]
Nope, rather because of the immense undertaking people that use Hyperion are taking on. People usually underestimate the work that goes in to making a playable server with one that just has networking and player updating.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Arete [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @Mintzy Mintzy
item.description:
@Mintzy wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:9, topic:518235”][quote author=Mintzy link=topic=636498.msg4291505#msg4291505 date=1367348986]

[quote author=Cruel Truth link=topic=636498.msg4291493#msg4291493 date=1367346420]

[quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=636498.msg4291315#msg4291315 date=1367288284]
A Hyperion project is always interesting. Good luck.
[/quote]why? because we get to watch them go from fairly good bases to absolutely crap?
[/quote]And why are you assuming I will make hyperion absolutely crap? Do you have any knowledge of what I’m capable of? If not, please do not assume things and make absolutely crap posts. Thanks.
[/quote]My post was a generalization. I do wish you the best of luck in your project though. I don’t want you to get the wrong idea of what I wrote earlier.[/quote]In that case, I’m sorry for my offensive tone and I thank you for the luck :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Arete [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @Mintzy Mintzy
item.description:
@Mintzy wrote:

[center]
Welcome to the Project Arete development thread.[/center]

Base?
Project Arete will be based on Hyperion by Graham. The client will be based on SrcAllDummiesRemoved by MITB.

About
Project Arete will be based in the 2006-07 era of RuneScape. This projects goal is to have the perfect balance between skilling, economy and pvp.

Media:
Start of project

E2Tmv48.png823×581

gQavwqm.png816×573

an8qUys.png823×581

A2Tql0K.png823×581

xSRiiLp.png1366×539

yYGaGfY.png1366×539

Update log:

*downloaded hyperion & 317 deob
*fixed memory leak
*initial login area is now edgeville
*running with energy added
*profanity censor removed
*equipment bonuses added
*npc loading via xml file added
*npc option packets added
*character design packet added
*crc enabled
*private messaging added
*ground item system added

If you wish to join this project, please PM me or message me on skype. justinmintza
You do NOT need to know much about Hyperion nor even java. I am always happy to teach what I know :).
